metadata.title: CVE-2017-18198 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: print_iso9660_recurse in iso-info.c in GNU libcdio before 1.0.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read)or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted iso file.

criterions.comment: libcdio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
